comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Compare to faces in photos at Marie Doro - A Forgotten Star [To find them, search for the title on the web. Flickr seems to trap the URL, presumably because the host -- freewebs -- includes questionable content. Then choose the Oliver Twist link.] This looks to be the 1912 Broadway production of "Oliver Twist" starring Nat Goodwin (Fagin), Constance Collier (Nancy), Lyn Harding (Bill Sykes), and Marie Doro (Oliver). See www.ibdb.com/production.asp?ID=7447 and query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F06E2DD143CE633A... and query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DE1D6173CE633A...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information. We'll look into it.
